# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Special Instructions

{{instructions}}

# Solution

```julia
function pig_latinify(input_text)
    isempty(input_text) && return input_text # early return for empty input
    threads = []
    results = []
    foreach(input_text) do word
        push!(threads, Threads.@spawn begin
            prefix, rest = split(word, "", limit=2)
            push!(results, "$rest$prefix" * "ay")
        end)
    end
    foreach(threads) do thread
        wait(thread)
    end
    return results
end

input_text =  ["apple", "banana", "cherry", "date","elderberry","fig", "grape", "honeydew"]
pig_latin_text = pig_latinify(input_text)
```
